comments: Also the least positive x such that sin(exp(x))==0. See 1991 Mathematica Conference, Elementary Tutorial Notes, page 25.Also real part of log(log(-1)). - _Stanislav Sykora_, May 11 2015
formula: Equals log(log(-1)) - (Pi/2)*I. - _Stanislav Sykora_, May 11 2015Equals 1 + Sum_{n>=1} Zeta(2*n)/(n*(2*n+1)*2^(2*n)), where Zeta is the Riemann Zeta function. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Mar 04 2016
author: Hsu, Po-Wei (Benny) (arsene_lupin(AT)intekom.co.za), Jan 14 2000
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Jan 20 2000
